# MomentBook

> A quiet journey archive that can start with tracking or photos. Not a social networkâ€”no feeds, likes, or rankings. Private by default with optional publishing.

## Main Sections

- [About](https://momentbook.app/en/about): Two ways to begin (tracking or photos), product principles, and philosophy
- [FAQ](https://momentbook.app/en/faq): Common questions about how MomentBook works, privacy, and features
- [Download](https://momentbook.app/en/download): iOS and Android apps (free), system requirements, and getting started
- [Journeys](https://momentbook.app/en/journeys): Examples of published journeys (public content)

## Product Principles

- Two ways to begin: tracking-based journey or photo-only organization
- Private by default; publishing is optional and creates a unique public page
- No social features: no feeds, likes, or rankings
- AI helps with titles and summaries but doesn't create for you
- Not a habit tracker, productivity tool, or recommendation engine
- A quiet archive for returning to journeys

## Technical Info

- **Mobile apps**: iOS 16.0 or later, Android 10.0 or later
- **Web**: Read-only public content (journeys, photos, user profiles)
- **Languages**: English, Korean, Japanese, Chinese, Spanish, Portuguese, French, Thai, Vietnamese (9 languages supported)
- **Architecture**: Next.js 16 (App Router), React 18, TypeScript, SSG + ISR

## Policies & Support

- [Privacy Policy](https://momentbook.app/en/privacy)
- [Terms of Service](https://momentbook.app/en/terms)
- [Community Guidelines](https://momentbook.app/en/community-guidelines)
- [Support](https://momentbook.app/en/support): support@momentbook.app

## What MomentBook Is Not

MomentBook is not a social network, habit tracker, productivity tool, or performance optimizer. It doesn't have feeds, likes, rankings, or social interactions. It's not designed for sharing as a primary goal. It's a quiet archive for returning to your own journeys.
